summary.value: Its purplish berries contain a deadly magical venom.

effects.effect: All damage you deal becomes poison, its type cannot change, and it ignores Immunities and Resistances.

All damage you deal becomes poison, its type cannot change, and it ignores Immunities and Resistances. Additionally, when you deal poison damage for the first time during your turn, you deal extra damage equal to 【your Skill Level in Chloromancy】 and each creature that lost Hit Points this way suffers @EFFECT[poisoned].
